summary: Based on the provided documents, there is no information available about Michael Epstein. The documents primarily concern the FBI's interactions with the Senate Select Committee on Intelligence Activities (SSC) regarding various investigations, including those related to Martin Luther King Jr., electronic surveillance, and alleged ties to the Communist Party USA. The documents focus on the review and sanitization of documents, responses to committee requests, and discussions on domestic intelligence investigations. Michael Epstein is not mentioned in any of the summaries.
